title: The Fixer
description: A man imprisoned on death row for twenty years for a murder he didn't commit is scheduled for execution in forty days. A young lawyer convinced of his innocence puts her career and her life on the line to discover the truth. And the only chance to overturn the conviction lies with a retired police detective who is reluctant to revisit his past. Power. Greed. Secrets. Lies. Murder. The Fixer
author: John       Henderson
